complaint.description: No service from Vodacom. They promised to have stock of all the items for my upgrade, but when I called to inquire about the delivery, they said they have no stock. This has been going on for 2 weeks and it seems like the employees at Vodacom are only interested in getting the upgrade or new contract, even if they don't have the products they are selling. I have to chase them every day to get what I ordered.
complaint.suggestion: Improve stock management and ensure that customers are not promised items that are not available. Provide better customer service and communication regarding stock availability.

meta.review_content: There we go again. Vodacom called back from the complaints department telling me that they have sorted everything out and they have stock of all the items as per the upgrade. But surprise surprise when I called this morning to find out about the delivery have start telling me again they have no stock. Really this is becoming a joke it has been 2 weeks of lies and people bot having a clue what they doing . It seems like the goal for the employees at vodacom is only to get the upgrade or the new contract even if they do not have the products they selling and then it becomes your problem to chase them everyday to get what you ordered. My advice to anybody wanting to upgrade with vodacom via the call centre . Is DO NOT DO IT. Rather go to the other service providers .
